bug.author: Lijo050
bug.summary: Azure auth: cannot call non-function spt.Token (type adal.Token)
bug.description:
/kind bug I was trying to install kubeflow on Azure by following: <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/azure/deploy/install-kubeflow/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/azure/deploy/install-kubeflow/</denchmark-link>
And then at faced the issue:
Then by following <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3759>#3759</denchmark-link> I Imported the azure auth plugins and while faced this issue: ../../.go/pkg/mod/k8s.io/client-go@v0.0.0-20190228174230-b40b2a5939e4/plugin/pkg/client/auth/azure/azure.go:247:4: cannot use json.Number(expiresIn) (type json.Number) as type string in field value ../../.go/pkg/mod/k8s.io/client-go@v0.0.0-20190228174230-b40b2a5939e4/plugin/pkg/client/auth/azure/azure.go:248:4: cannot use json.Number(expiresOn) (type json.Number) as type string in field value ../../.go/pkg/mod/k8s.io/client-go@v0.0.0-20190228174230-b40b2a5939e4/plugin/pkg/client/auth/azure/azure.go:249:4: cannot use json.Number(expiresOn) (type json.Number) as type string in field value ../../.go/pkg/mod/k8s.io/client-go@v0.0.0-20190228174230-b40b2a5939e4/plugin/pkg/client/auth/azure/azure.go:301:25: cannot call non-function spt.Token (type adal.Token) Here the last line cannot call non-function spt.Token (type adal.Token) is something new. Environment:
Kubeflow version: latest from the kubeflow master branch Kubernetes platform: Azure Kubernetes version: Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"16", GitVersion:"v1.16.0", GoVersion:"go1.12.9", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"} Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"13", GitVersion:"v1.13.10", GoVersion:"go1.11.13", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/aronchick>@aronchick</denchmark-link> hey david, is there someone that might look at this?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Lijo050>@Lijo050</denchmark-link> Can this be solved using my patch <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3881>#3881</denchmark-link> ? Or they are different things?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/yeya24>@yeya24</denchmark-link> Yes I could solve it with your patch, Many thanks
